Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Zenit Abeba, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, convenient to Fundacion Juan March and Prado Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Sports Palace Madrid and Las Ventas.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fundacion Juan March - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Sports Palace Madrid - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Las Ventas - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
ABC Serrano - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Fundacion Lazaro Galdiano - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
U.S. Embassy - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Lazaro Galdiano Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
La Caixa Foundation - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Museum of Public Art - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Torrespana - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
National Archaeological Museum of Spain - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Plaza de Colon - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Teatro Fernan Gomez - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Sorolla Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
National Auditorium of Music - 1.7 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for Zenit Abeba is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 9.7 km / 6.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
